Title: Authorizes and directs the department of environmental conservation to conduct a study of the water supply and water management in the state
Summary: Authorizes and directs the department of environmental conservation to conduct a study of the water supply and water management in the state; requires a report on or before December 31, 2024 and in odd numbered years thereafter.
LawCode: Add ยง15-1531, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to authorizing and directing the department of environmental conservation to conduct a study of the water supply and water management in the state
